algorithm_technique: Iterate from both ends of the array. Find the first house from the start with a different color than the first house, and from the end with a different color than the last house.
problem_summary_simple: Find the maximum distance between two houses with different colors.
problem_summary_technical: Compares the first house's color with all other houses from the start and end, and the last house's color with all other houses from the start and end.
key_insights: The maximum distance will always involve one of the endpoints (house 0 or house n-1).
We only need to check distances from house 0 to any house with a different color, and from house n-1 to any house with a different color.
This approach avoids checking all possible pairs of houses.
